user.title: Open Plantbook API Configuration
user.description: Enter your Open Plantbook API OAuth2 client credentials

reauth_confirm.title: Open Plantbook Reference Library
reauth_confirm.description: The Open Plantbook integration needs to re-authenticate your account

image_config.title: Image Download Configuration
image_config.description: Configure whether to download plant images

data_description.download_path: Local path where plant images will be stored (relative to Home Assistant config)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Open Plantbook API

data_description.download_path: Local path where plant images will be stored (relative to Home Assistant config).

user.title: Search for a new plant
user.description: Enter the name of the plant to perform a search:

data_description.plant_name: Hint: Entering scientific name of the plant from the plant passport may yield better results

select_plant.title: Select Plant
select_plant.description: Select a plant from the search results

no_results_found.title: Search for a new plant
no_results_found.description: The search for {plant_name} on Open Plantbook yielded no results.

data.action: What would you like to do?

data_description.friendly_name: Display name for this plant in Home Assistant. This is what you'll see in the UI
data_description.scientific_name: Latin/scientific name used for plant identification and care data lookup
data_description.common_name: Common name or nickname for the plant (e.g., 'Snake Plant' for Sansevieria)
data_description.categories: Plant family classifications, add as many as required

names_section.name: Names
names_section.description: Configure how this plant will be identified in Home Assistant

data_description.friendly_name: Display name for this plant in Home Assistant. This is what you'll see in the UI
data_description.scientific_name: Latin/scientific name used for plant identification and care data lookup
data_description.common_name: Common name or nickname for the plant (e.g., 'Snake Plant' for Sansevieria)

categories_section.name: Categories
categories_section.description: Plant family classifications, add as many as required

data_description.categories: Plant family classifications, add as many as required

temperature_values_section.name: Temperature Requirements
temperature_values_section.description: Set the ideal temperature range for your plant. Sensors can monitor if conditions are within these thresholds.

light_values_section.name: Light Requirements
light_values_section.description: Configure light levels in lux. These values help determine if your plant is getting adequate lighting.

moisture_values_section.name: Soil Moisture Requirements
moisture_values_section.description: Set moisture percentage thresholds to monitor when your plant needs watering or if soil is too wet.

humidity_values_section.name: Humidity Requirements
humidity_values_section.description: Configure the ideal humidity range. Many houseplants benefit from higher humidity than typical indoor levels.

soil_ec_values_section.name: Soil EC Requirements
soil_ec_values_section.description: Electrical conductivity (EC) indicates nutrient levels in soil. Higher EC means more nutrients are available.

error.categories_required: At least one category is required
error.min_greater_than_max_light: Minimum light cannot be greater than maximum light
error.min_equals_max_light: Minimum and maximum light cannot be equal
error.min_greater_than_max_temperature: Minimum temperature cannot be greater than maximum temperature
error.min_equals_max_temperature: Minimum and maximum temperature cannot be equal
error.min_greater_than_max_humidity: Minimum humidity cannot be greater than maximum humidity
error.min_equals_max_humidity: Minimum and maximum humidity cannot be equal
error.min_greater_than_max_moisture: Minimum moisture cannot be greater than maximum moisture
error.min_equals_max_moisture: Minimum and maximum moisture cannot be equal
error.min_greater_than_max_soil_ec: Minimum soil EC cannot be greater than maximum soil EC
error.min_equals_max_soil_ec: Minimum and maximum soil EC cannot be equal

options.manual_entry: None of these - Enter plant manually
